title: Mobile responsive layout
description: Ensure the dashboard works well on tablet and mobile devices. Sidebar should collapse, tables should adapt, and touch targets should be appropriately sized.
acceptance_criteria: Sidebar collapses to hamburger menu on mobile (<768px)
Mobile nav drawer with full navigation
Stat cards stack vertically on mobile
Tables become card lists on mobile or scroll horizontally
Charts remain readable on small screens
No horizontal scroll on main content
implementation_notes: Use TailwindCSS responsive prefixes (sm:, md:, lg:)
Consider headless UI for mobile nav drawer
Test on actual devices or device emulator
Prioritize readability over density on mobile
